content: on both sides the beginning of your round becomes the side of the bunny finish off legs make 2 nd round 1 chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 10 single_crochet rnds 3-9 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch stuff w/ filling of your choice then holding the front and back together chain 1 and slip_stitch the front and back together working through the single_crochet on both sides the beginning of your round becomes the side of the leg finish off leaving a 6 tail sew to the bottom of the body arms make 2 nd round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet rnds 3-7 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch stuff w/ filling of your choice then holding the front and back together chain 1 and slip_stitch the front and back together working through the single_crochet on both sides finish off leaving a 6 tail sew to sides of the body across rnds 13-16 ears make 2 row 1 leaving a 6 tail chain 10 single_crochet in the back ridge of the 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 9 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn slip_stitch in next 7 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 4 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet slip_stitch in next 7 finish off using the 6 tail sew to the top of the head across rnds 2-3 tail leaving a 2 tail chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 6 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook remove hook insert in top of chain 3 get loop from the last double_crochet made and pull through the chain finish off leaving a 6 tail stuff the inside of the tail with the 2 tail from the beginning and then sew the tail to the back of the bunny using the 6 tail across rnds 16-18 finishing embroider eyes and nose if desired weave in all ends terminology abbreviation full term chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet round round st sts stitch stitches decrease decrease copyright © 2006 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for
